p2p_ss.test_case_description: Peer to peer video call with screen sharing
p2p_ss.run_guide: Test setup: one DUT and one remote client(Windows/Mac/Android/iOS) with Teams installed , Steps : 1. Join the meeting from the DUT, 2. Join the meeting from the remote client and share the screen, 3. Play some high motion video with 24-30 fps, in full screen on the remote client, 4. Press 'Enter' Key to continue...
